attributes.action: allow qualified Veterinarians to be called Dr in the UK as they are in the USA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Veterinarians study for 5 years as do human doctors. They then find Internships as do human Doctors. The only difference is that where as a human doctor learns about one species (Man), Veterinarians have to learn many, many other species (Dogs, Cats, Cows, horses, etc). 

They work just as hard and do not get the full recognition that they deserve in the UK.

This is not how we should treat the people who look after alot of the UK's produce and of course many of mans best friends.
